author: lektran
msg: In GenericDAO.selectListIteratorByCondition(...) the order of the select fields wasn't being maintained.  This causes problems later on if the EntityListIterator needs to perform a count query where the select field ordering is important for distinct queries (particularly for the likes of postgres which doesn't support SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT *) which can result if the first field is an aggregate).

author: zwoop
msg: TS-171 Fixes for getting the altinfo check to succeeds

author: eyang
msg: CHUKWA-7. Handle pid in /tmp in case CHUKWA_HOME is not defined. (Ari Rabkin via Eric Yang)
